page.title: 18Family life
page.content: My name is Robin, I am 10. My father is a schoolteacher in Newbury. I have 2 sisters caled Emily and Anna. Emily is ll and Anna is 14. My mother is a librarian in Benson. We all live in a small cottage. We have nine pets, a dog called Sam, 2 cats called Fluffy and Thomas and 6 chickens. In the morning I get up at 6 when Dad gets up. I leave for school at 8.45 as school begins at 9. We leave school at 3.15 when I get home I usually watch television or play outside. My name is Rachel I have a sister called Sarah, I am 7 and Sarah is 6. Our family is an old family and was named after a village in Suffolk. My mum is called Judi and my dad is Richard.My dad works at Chalgrove at a garage and mum is a hairdresser. I live in a cottage in Ewelme. It belongs to Ewelme Trust.
